Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small $AlgebraDisplayName $FunctionName is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic $AlgebraDisplayName of orders $MinDomainSize to $MaxDomainSize.
<#Include Label = "$FunctionName">
$OperationNames, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small $AlgebraDisplayName
"Is$SingularAlgebraName" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic $AlgebraDisplayName of orders $MinDomainSize to $MaxDomainSize. It returns true if the model is a Small $AlgebraDisplayName, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "Is$SingularAlgebraName">
